script.name: !plugin.gz.missile.def.mk3
script.description: Turret Missile Defense Mk3 - main script
script.sourceplaintext:
* Multi-Purpose X3 Turret Script - by Gazz * Formerly known as Missile Defense Mk2. *$Debug = 6101
* Arguments: * turret.id : not required but demanded by engine by ancient custom. * Script: The turret script profile to load. (INT 10-19)
while not [THIS] -> is in active sector @ = wait randomly from 50000 to 80000 ms end $turretid = get task ID skip if is datatype[ $Script ] == DATATYPE_INT return null $Dummy1 = 'GZ.MSL.DEF.MK3.' + 'AI' do if [OWNER] == Player $Dummy1 = 'GZ.MSL.DEF.MK3.' + 'PL' $Config.arr = get global variable: name=$Dummy1
skip if is datatype[ $Config.arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY @ $Config.arr = [THIS] -> call script !plugin.gz.missile.def.mk3.menu : Mode='setup' Race or THIS=[OWNER] Script=null Turret script array=null
$Dummy2 = size of array $Config.arr do if $Script < 10 OR $Script >= $Dummy2 return null $Turret.Script.Config.arr = $Config.arr[$Script]
if [THIS] -> can turret $turretid fire missiles * Missile turret $is.missile.turret = [TRUE] $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr = get global variable: name='GZ.GLOBAL.CM.ARRAY' $Global.Msl.Def.arr = get global variable: name='GZ.GLOBAL.MD.ARRAY' if not is datatype[ $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr = array alloc: size=0 set global variable: name='GZ.GLOBAL.CM.ARRAY' value=$Global.Ctr.Msl.arr $Global.Msl.Def.arr = array alloc: size=0 set global variable: name='GZ.GLOBAL.MD.ARRAY' value=$Global.Msl.Def.arr end gosub Get.Countermissile $Countermissile.Lifetime = 1
else * Laser turret $firestate = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='firestate.adv' $firestate.friendly = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='firestate.adv.friendly' if not is datatype[ $firestate.friendly ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $firestate = create new array, arguments=-1, -1, -1, -1, -1 append -1 to array $firestate append -1 to array $firestate $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get number of turrets resize array $firestate to $Dummy1 $firestate.friendly = array alloc: size=$Dummy1 [THIS] ->set local variable: name='firestate.adv' value=$firestate [THIS] ->set local variable: name='firestate.adv.friendly' value=$firestate.friendly end $firestate[$turretid] = -1 end
$Time = playing time $Next.Configuration.Update = -1 $My.Laser.Range = 0 gosub Update.Configuration
$My.Nr.of.Lasers = [THIS] -> get max. number of lasers in turret $turretid $Original.Owner = [OWNER]
$Energy.Cap = [THIS] -> get maximum laser strength $Energy.Cap = $Energy.Cap / 6 * Rate of fire refinement has to be put on hold in a low energy condition.
$Firing.Delay.Reset.Freq = 120 $Missile.Overkill.Percent = 10 $Missile.Overkill.Turrets = 8 * Missile turrets always fire a few extra missiles. More if the target has turrets $Firing.Delay.Reset = 0 $Firing.Delay = 300 $Next.Protect.Target.Update = -1 $Next.Extended.MD.Update = -1 $Next.Global.MD.Cleanup = -1 $Next.Missile.Range.Update = -1 $Next.Counter.Msl.Update = -1 $Next.Distance.Update = -1 $Missile.Main.Wait = 1000 $Target.Min.Distance = [THIS] -> get size of object $Target.Min.Distance = $Target.Min.Distance + 700 $Missile.Range.Max = 0 $Protected.Targets.arr = array alloc: size=0 $Missiles.Arr = array alloc: size=0 $Find.Flags = [Find.Nearest] | [Find.Enemy] | [Find.Multiple] | [Find.Known] | [Find.Visible] $Find.Flags.Protect = [Find.Nearest] | [Find.Multiple] | [Find.ForceUsePos] $My.Size = [THIS] -> get size of object $Engage.Dumbfire.Range = $My.Size + 2000 $Missile.Swarm.Count = get global parameter value: parameter='SG_MISSILE_SWARM_COUNT' default=8 $Victim.existed = [FALSE]
* - - - Main loop - - - while [TRUE] if not [OWNER] == $Original.Owner break else if [THIS] -> is docked gosub No.Operation.Wait continue else if not [THIS] -> is in active sector * Happens when scripts start a turret script directly gosub No.Operation.Wait continue end gosub Get.Max.Missile.Range
gosub Update.Configuration $Now.Firing = null
if not $is.missile.turret if not [THIS] -> get max laser strength in turret $turretid gosub No.Lasers.Wait continue end end
gosub Find.New.Target if $victim -> exists set script command target: $victim if $is.missile.turret gosub Track.and.fire.MISSILES else $Victim.existed = [TRUE] gosub Track.and.fire.LASERS end else if $Victim.existed * Target was destroyed or left range, better to swap back to longer range guns. $Next.Configuration.Update = -1 $Victim.existed = [FALSE] end set script command target: null
if $is.missile.turret if $Missiles.have.been.fired $Missiles.have.been.fired = null @ = wait $Pause.ms.after.firing.missiles ms $Missile.Main.Wait = $Pause.ms.after.firing.missiles / 3 else $Missile.Main.Wait = $Missile.Main.Wait + 50 $Missile.Main.Wait = get minimum, $Missile.Main.Wait, $Pause.ms.after.firing.missiles, null, null, null $Missile.Wait.Lo = $Missile.Main.Wait / 2 $Missile.Wait.Hi = $Missile.Main.Wait + 1000 @ = wait randomly from $Missile.Wait.Lo to $Missile.Wait.Hi ms end continue
else if $Now.Firing * Still firing - just switching to another target * A long wait is not necessary because the laser refire rate is added. @ = wait randomly from 50 to 80 ms * Don't doze off while the ship is still fighting : else if [THIS] -> get attack target @ = wait randomly from 500 to 900 ms else if [THIS] == [PLAYERSHIP] @ = wait randomly from 500 to 800 ms else if [THIS] -> get attacker @ = wait randomly from 500 to 900 ms else if size of array $Missiles.Arr @ = wait randomly from 500 to 700 ms else @ = wait randomly from 5000 to 8000 ms end end return null
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Update.Configuration: do if $Time < $Next.Configuration.Update endsub $Next.Configuration.Update = $Time + 151
$My.Scanner.Range = [THIS] -> get scanner range $Burst.Length = $Config.arr[1] * For firing at single missiles. $Salvo.Length = $Config.arr[2] * Look for a new target after x seconds $Salvo.Length.Short = $Salvo.Length / 2 $Prot.Nr.of.Closest.stations = $Config.arr[3]
if [THIS] -> can turret $turretid fire missiles $Pause.ms.after.firing.missiles = $Config.arr[4] gosub Get.Countermissile else $Weapon.Changing = $Turret.Script.Config.arr[1] $Weapon.Changing.AREA = $Turret.Script.Config.arr[2] * 1=cap ships, 2=all ships if not [THIS] -> is of class Big Ship do if $Weapon.Changing == 1 $Weapon.Changing = null end if $Weapon.Changing if not $Now.Firing skip if [THIS] -> is script !turret.swaptask.adv on stack of task=33 @ $firestate = [THIS] -> call script !turret.swaptask.adv : no friendly fire -psg,id- =$Weapon.Changing.AREA communication array=$firestate start as task=null * firestate will be updated while the script runs $firestate.friendly[$turretid] = $Weapon.Changing.AREA end else $firestate[$turretid] = -1 end if $Weapon.Changing AND $Now.Firing == null [THIS] ->select and switch lasers for target null in turret $turretid: scan for friends $Weapon.Changing.AREA end $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get maximum laser range: turret=$turretid $My.Laser.Range = get maximum, $My.Laser.Range, $Dummy1, null, null, null end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ * _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Track.and.fire.LASERS: if $Weapon.Changing if not [THIS] -> is script !turret.swaptask.adv on stack of task=33 @ $firestate = [THIS] -> call script !turret.swaptask.adv : no friendly fire -psg,id- =$Weapon.Changing.AREA communication array=$firestate start as task=null *else if [OWNER] == Player *[THIS] ->select and switch lasers for target $victim in turret $turretid: scan for friends $Weapon.Changing.AREA end $firestate[$turretid] = $victim else $firestate[$turretid] = -1 end
* dynamically adjust rate of fire gosub Get.Installed.Laser if $Laser != $Slot0.Laser.last $Firing.Delay = get default launch time difference for missile type: $Laser $Firing.Delay.Min = 0 $Slot0.Laser.last = $Laser end if $Time > $Firing.Delay.Reset $Firing.Delay.Reset = $Time + $Firing.Delay.Reset.Freq $Firing.Delay.Min = 0 * Otherwise a laser out of ammo or energy would PERMANENTLY lower ROF. end
* track and fire - LASERS $Burst.Fire = 0 $Time = playing time $Salvo.End = $Time + $Salvo.Length while 1 $Now.Firing = [TRUE] gosub Get.Installed.Laser skip if $Laser break
$Laser.Speed = get bullet speed of laser $Laser do if [THIS] -> is docked break $Time = playing time
if $Attack.my.target $Target = get player tracking aim if $Target != $Attack.my.target $Attack.my.target = null $victim = null end else if $Attack.my.Target.possible $Target = get player tracking aim if $Target -> exists if [THIS] -> is $Target a enemy if [THIS] -> is $Target in firing range of turret $turretid break end end end end
* if a lesser priority target is tracked, occasionally check for primary objective if not $Is.Primary.Priority do if $Time > $Salvo.End break if $Missiles.are.primary AND $Time > $Salvo.End - $Salvo.Length.Short $Missiles.are.primary = null $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> find nearest missile aiming to me if $Dummy1 -> exists do if [THIS] -> is $Dummy1 in firing range of turret $turretid break end end end
if not $fireonmissile * track SHIP skip if [THIS] -> is $victim in firing range of turret $turretid break @ $fire = [THIS] -> turn turret $turretid to target $victim : timeout=500 ms skip if $victim -> exists break skip if [THIS] -> is $victim a enemy break do if $Weapon.Changing $firestate[$turretid] = $victim else * track MISSILE if not $victim -> exists $victim = null gosub Select.Missile.Target skip if $victim -> exists break end if not [THIS] -> is $victim in firing range of turret $turretid $victim = null gosub Select.Missile.Target skip if $victim -> exists break end
@ $fire = [THIS] -> turn turret $turretid to target $victim : timeout=500 ms if not $victim -> exists $Index1 = get index of $victim in array $Missiles.Arr offset=-1 + 1 remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 dec $Missiles.Visible = continue end do if $Weapon.Changing $firestate[$turretid] = $victim end
if $fire == FLRET_FIREFREE $Fire.Result = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $victim using turret $turretid gosub Adjust.ROF * Engage multiple missiles before the bullets hit if $fireonmissile AND $Missiles.Visible > 4 AND $Laser.Speed < 1100 inc $Burst.Fire = if $Burst.Fire >= $Burst.Length $Index1 = get index of $victim in array $Missiles.Arr offset=-1 + 1 if $Index1 != -1 remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 dec $Missiles.Visible = end $victim = null continue end end
else if $fire == FLRET_TIMEOUT * still tracking - only ever happens with heavy lasers skip if $Missiles.Visible > 1 @ = wait randomly from 20 to 80 ms end
if $fireonmissile gosub Update.Missile.Array else if not $victim -> exists break end end * = end while - tracking endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ * _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Track.and.fire.MISSILES: $Time = playing time $Missile.Ware = null if $fireonmissile skip if is datatype[ $Missiles.Arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY endsub gosub Get.Countermissile else * Fire on a ship / station @ $Missile.Ware = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.best.missile.fortarget : Target=$victim Set Missile Fire Time Diff=null end skip if $Missile.Ware endsub skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Missile.Ware in cargo bay endsub $Missile.Range = get range of missile type $Missile.Ware $Missile.Range = ( $Missile.Range * 92 ) / 100
$Missile.Wait.Lo = get default launch time difference for missile type: $Missile.Ware $Missile.Wait.Lo = $Missile.Wait.Lo + 80 $Missile.Wait.Hi = $Missile.Wait.Lo + 120
if $fireonmissile $Index1 = size of array $Missiles.Arr while $Index1 > -1 $Index2 = $My.Nr.of.Lasers while $Index2 dec $Index2 = dec $Index1 = skip if $Index1 > -1 break skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Missile.Ware in cargo bay break $Missile = $Missiles.Arr[$Index1] if not $Missile -> exists remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 dec $Missiles.Visible = continue else if not [THIS] -> has same environment as $Missile remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 dec $Missiles.Visible = continue end
$Distance = get distance between [THIS] and $Missile if $Distance > $Missile.Range continue else $Dummy1 = get index of $Missile in array $Global.Msl.Def.arr offset=-1 + 1 if $Dummy1 > -1 $Dummy2 = $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr[$Dummy1] if $Time < $Dummy2 remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 dec $Missiles.Visible = continue else remove element from array $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr at index $Dummy1 remove element from array $Global.Msl.Def.arr at index $Dummy1 end end end
if [THIS] -> fire missile $Missile.Ware from turret $turretid on $Missile $Missiles.have.been.fired = [TRUE] append $Missile to array $Global.Msl.Def.arr $Dummy2 = get bullet speed of laser $Missile.Ware $Dummy1 = $Time + $Distance / $Dummy2 + $Countermissile.Lifetime append $Dummy1 to array $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 dec $Missiles.Visible = else break end end skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Missile.Ware in cargo bay break @ = wait randomly from $Missile.Wait.Lo to $Missile.Wait.Hi ms end
else * Fire on a ship / station $Damage = get missile max damage of $Missile.Ware $Dummy1 = get missile flags of $Missile.Ware $Flag.Swarm = ( $Dummy1 & [Missile.Swarm] ) == [Missile.Swarm] do if $Flag.Swarm $Damage = $Damage * $Missile.Swarm.Count $Dummy2 = 0 if $victim -> is of class Ship $Dummy3 = $victim -> get number of turrets do if $Dummy3 > 1 $Dummy2 = $Missile.Overkill.Turrets end $Damage.Incoming = 0 $Target.Max.Hull = $victim -> get max hull $Damage.Incoming = $victim -> get maximum shield strength $Damage.Incoming = $Damage.Incoming + $Dummy1 $Damage.Incoming = ( ( $Damage.Incoming + $Dummy1 ) * ( $Missile.Overkill.Percent + $Dummy2 ) ) / 100 $Dummy1 = $victim -> get current shield strength $Dummy2 = $victim -> get hull $Damage.Incoming = ( $Damage.Incoming + $Dummy1 + $Dummy2 ) / $Damage inc $Damage.Incoming =
$Index1 = $Damage.Incoming while $Index1 > 0 $Index2 = $My.Nr.of.Lasers
$Missile.Refire = [THIS] -> get fire missile time difference in seconds [THIS] ->set fire missile time difference to 1 ms while $Index2 dec $Index2 = skip if $victim -> exists break skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Missile.Ware in cargo bay break skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $victim break
if [THIS] -> fire missile $Missile.Ware from turret $turretid on $victim dec $Index1 = $Missiles.have.been.fired = [TRUE] else break end skip if $Index1 > 0 break end [THIS] ->set fire missile time difference to $Missile.Refire ms skip if $victim -> exists break skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Missile.Ware in cargo bay break skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $victim break @ = wait randomly from $Missile.Wait.Lo to $Missile.Wait.Hi ms end end
endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Get.Countermissile: * Find the best countermissile we have. * Do not make the script call if we can reuse the previous one. if $Countermissile AND $Countermissile.Range if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Countermissile in cargo bay if $Time < $Next.Counter.Msl.Update $Missile.Ware = $Countermissile endsub end end end $Next.Counter.Msl.Update = $Time + 157
$Countermissile.Range = 0 @ $Countermissile = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.best.missile.fortarget : Target='counter.missile' Set Missile Fire Time Diff=null $Missile.Ware = $Countermissile do if $Missile.Ware $Countermissile.Range = get range of missile type $Missile.Ware endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Get.Max.Missile.Range: $Time = playing time do if $Time < $Next.Missile.Range.Update endsub $Next.Missile.Range.Update = $Time + 45 $Missile.Range.Max = 0
$Marines.Arr = [THIS] -> get compatible missile array from cargobay skip if is datatype[ $Marines.Arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY endsub
$Index1 = size of array $Marines.Arr while $Index1 dec $Index1 = $Missile.Ware = $Marines.Arr[$Index1] $Missile.Range = get range of missile type $Missile.Ware $Missile.Range.Max = get maximum, $Missile.Range, $Missile.Range.Max, null, null, null end $Missile.Range.Max = ( $Missile.Range.Max * 90 ) / 100 endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Get.Installed.Laser: * Unless on a manual loadout by the player, this gets me a laser the first time. $Laser = null $Index.Lasers = $My.Nr.of.Lasers while $Index.Lasers dec $Index.Lasers = $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get laser type in turret $turretid at slot $Index.Lasers if $Dummy1 $Laser = $Dummy1 break end end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ * _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Find.New.Target: $Time = playing time gosub Check.For.Protect.Missions
$victim = null $fireonmissile = null $Is.Primary.Priority = null $Attack.my.Target.possible = null $Missiles.are.primary = null
$Index.Priority.Max = size of array $Turret.Script.Config.arr *$Index.Priority.Max = $Index.Priority.Max - 2 dec $Index.Priority.Max = *$Index.Priority = size of array $Turret.Script.Config.arr $Index.Priority = 9 $Primary.Priotity = 10
while $Index.Priority < $Index.Priority.Max AND $victim == null inc $Index.Priority = $Attack.my.target = null $Priority = $Turret.Script.Config.arr[$Index.Priority] $Target = null
if $Priority == 1 AND [THIS] == [PLAYERSHIP] * Attack cockpit target - playership only $Attack.my.Target.possible = [TRUE] gosub Attack.My.Target.Check
else if $Priority == 2 AND [OWNER] == Player * Attack cockpit target - all ships $Attack.my.Target.possible = [TRUE] gosub Attack.My.Target.Check
else if $Priority == 3 * Attack what my ship is attacking $Target = [THIS] -> get attack target
else if $Priority == 4 * Attack any enemies $Class.Wanted = Ship $Class.Unwanted = Astronaut gosub Find.Ship.Class $Class.Unwanted = null * Include stations skip if $Target OR $is.missile.turret $Target = [THIS] -> find enemy in firing range of turret $turretid
else if $Priority == 5 * Attack any enemies - conditional on ship orders $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get command if $Dummy1 == COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_RANGE OR $Dummy1 == COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_AND_LAND OR $Dummy1 == COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES $Class.Wanted = Ship $Class.Unwanted = Astronaut gosub Find.Ship.Class $Class.Unwanted = null * Include stations skip if $Target OR $is.missile.turret $Target = [THIS] -> find enemy in firing range of turret $turretid end
else if $Priority == 6 * Attack capital ships - big $Class.Wanted = Big Ship $Class.Unwanted = null gosub Find.Ship.Class
else if $Priority == 7 * Attack capital ships - huge $Class.Wanted = Huge Ship $Class.Unwanted = null gosub Find.Ship.Class
else if $Priority == 8 * Attack fighters $Class.Wanted = Fighter $Class.Unwanted = null gosub Find.Ship.Class
else if $Priority == 9 * Protect ship $Target = [THIS] -> get attacker if not $Target -> exists $Target = null else if not [THIS] -> has same environment as $Target $Target = null end
if not $Target if [THIS] -> is of class Big Ship $Dummy2 = [THIS] -> get incoming marines if $Dummy2 $Index1 = size of array $Dummy2 while $Index1 dec $Index1 = $Dummy1 = $Dummy2[$Index1] if $Dummy1 -> exists if $Dummy1 -> has same environment as [THIS] $Dummy1 ->set relation against [THIS] to Foe [THIS] ->set relation against $Dummy1 to Foe $Target = $Dummy1 end end end end end end
if not $Target $Index1 = size of array $Protected.Targets.arr while $Index1 dec $Index1 = $Dummy2 = $Protected.Targets.arr[$Index1] if $Dummy2 -> exists if $Dummy2 -> has same environment as [THIS] $Dummy1 = $Dummy2 -> get attacker if $Dummy1 -> exists do if $Dummy1 -> has same environment as [THIS] $Target = $Dummy1 * There can be multiple protected objects. end end end end end
else if $Priority == 10 * Missile Defense Any $Missiles.are.primary = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity $Missile.defence.level = 0 gosub Update.Missile.Array gosub Select.Missile.Target
else if $Priority == 11 * Attack capital ships - only big $Class.Wanted = Big Ship $Class.Unwanted = Huge Ship gosub Find.Ship.Class $Class.Unwanted = null
else if $Priority == 12 * Missile Defense High Yield $Missiles.are.primary = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity $Missile.defence.level = 1 gosub Update.Missile.Array gosub Select.Missile.Target
else if $Priority == 13 * Missile Defense Barrages $Missiles.are.primary = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity $Missile.defence.level = 2 gosub Update.Missile.Array gosub Select.Missile.Target
end
skip if $Target -> exists continue
* Don't shoot civilians if $Target -> is of class Astronaut skip if [THIS] -> is of class Big Ship continue *$Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get attack target *if not $Target == $Dummy1 $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get incoming marines skip if is datatype[ $Dummy1 ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY continue skip if find $Target in array: $Dummy1 continue *end end
* Missile turrets skip targets that already have missiles incoming if $is.missile.turret $Dummy1 = null if $Target -> is of class Ship $Dummy1 = $Target -> find nearest missile aiming to me else if $Target -> is of class Station $Dummy1 = $Target -> find nearest missile aiming to me end do if $Dummy1 -> exists continue end
if [THIS] -> has same environment as $Target if $Attack.my.target if $is.missile.turret $Distance = get distance between [THIS] and $Target if $Distance < $Missile.Range.Max $victim = $Target $Is.Primary.Priority = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity break end else if [THIS] -> is $Target in firing range of turret $turretid $victim = $Target $Is.Primary.Priority = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity break end end
else if [THIS] -> is $Target a enemy if $is.missile.turret $Distance = get distance between [THIS] and $Target if $Distance < $My.Scanner.Range $victim = $Target $Is.Primary.Priority = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity break end else if [THIS] -> is $Target in firing range of turret $turretid $victim = $Target $Is.Primary.Priority = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity break end else if $fireonmissile $victim = $fireonmissile $Is.Primary.Priority = $Index.Priority == $Primary.Priotity break
end end end
if $Weapon.Changing AND $firestate $firestate[$turretid] = $victim else if $firestate $firestate[$turretid] = -1 end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Attack.My.Target.Check: $Target = get player tracking aim skip if $Target -> exists endsub $Dummy2 = $Target -> get maintype $Dummy1 = $Target -> get owner race if $Target -> is of class Gate $Target = null endsub else if $Dummy2 == 10 if $Dummy1 == Player * Do not shoot at your own missiles - ever $Target = null endsub end else if not [THIS] -> is $Target a enemy $Target = null endsub end $Attack.my.target = $Target endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Check.For.Protect.Missions: do if $Time < $Next.Protect.Target.Update endsub $Next.Protect.Target.Update = $Time + 20 $Protect.Targets.local = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='GZ.PROTECT.TARGET' if not $Protect.Targets.local resize array $Protected.Targets.arr to 0 endsub else if [THIS] -> is script !ship.cmd.protect.std on stack of task=0 else if [THIS] -> is script !ship.cmd.killenemiesrange.std on stack of task=0 else if [THIS] -> is script !ship.cmd.defend.station.std on stack of task=0 else if [THIS] -> is script !ship.cmd.defendsector.std on stack of task=0 else [THIS] ->set local variable: name='GZ.PROTECT.TARGET' value=null resize array $Protected.Targets.arr to 0 endsub end
* This ship is protecting... something... in active.sector resize array $Protected.Targets.arr to 0 if is datatype[ $Protect.Targets.local ] == DATATYPE_SHIP if $Protect.Targets.local -> exists do if [THIS] -> has same environment as $Protect.Targets.local append $Protect.Targets.local to array $Protected.Targets.arr end endsub else if is datatype[ $Protect.Targets.local ] == DATATYPE_STATION if $Protect.Targets.local -> exists do if [THIS] -> has same environment as $Protect.Targets.local append $Protect.Targets.local to array $Protected.Targets.arr end endsub else if is datatype[ $Protect.Targets.local ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR else if is datatype[ $Protect.Targets.local ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY else * Illegal type [THIS] ->set local variable: name='GZ.PROTECT.TARGET' value=null endsub end
* Type is a pos array or sector * In either case I will protect the 2 closest non-hostile stations. if is datatype[ $Protect.Targets.local ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $Protect.Sector = $Protect.Targets.local $Protect.Targets.local = [THIS] -> get position as array else $Protect.Sector = $Protect.Targets.local[3] end skip if $Protect.Sector -> exists endsub do if $Protect.Sector != [ENVIRONMENT] endsub $Dummy1 = find station: sector=$Protect.Sector class or type=null race=null flags=$Find.Flags.Protect refobj=[THIS] maxdist=$Countermissile.Range maxnum=$Prot.Nr.of.Closest.stations refpos=$Protect.Targets.local $Index1 = size of array $Dummy1 while $Index1 dec $Index1 = $Dummy2 = $Dummy1[$Index1] skip if [THIS] -> is $Dummy2 a enemy append $Dummy2 to array $Protected.Targets.arr end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ No.Operation.Wait: set script command target: null @ = wait randomly from 10000 to 15000 ms endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ No.Lasers.Wait: do if $Weapon.Changing [THIS] ->select and switch lasers for target $victim in turret $turretid: scan for friends $Weapon.Changing.AREA do if [THIS] -> get max laser strength in turret $turretid endsub @ = wait randomly from 10000 to 15000 ms @ = wait randomly from 10000 to 15000 ms @ = wait randomly from 10000 to 15000 ms endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Adjust.ROF: $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get current laser strength if $Dummy1 > $Energy.Cap if $Fire.Result if $Firing.Delay > $Firing.Delay.Min $Firing.Delay = $Firing.Delay - 10 end else $Firing.Delay = $Firing.Delay + 10 do if $Firing.Delay > 3000 $Firing.Delay = 3000 $Firing.Delay.Min = $Firing.Delay end end $Firing.Delay = get maximum, 0, $Firing.Delay, null, null, null do if $Firing.Delay @ = wait $Firing.Delay ms
*if $Debug AND [OWNER] == Player *$Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get ID code *$Dummy1 = sprintf: fmt='%s %s Firing delay: %s', $Dummy1, [THIS], $Firing.Delay, null, null *display subtitle text: text=$Dummy1 duration=4000 ms *end
* There is one other guaranteed interrupt already. * Any more totally kill fast lasers like PBE or PRG. endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Update.Missile.Array: do if $Time < $Next.Update endsub do if [THIS] -> is docked endsub $Next.Update = $Time + 5 $Missiles.Arr = [THIS] -> get array of missiles aiming to me
* Engage missiles incoming to targets that I am *ordered* to protect. $Index3 = size of array $Protected.Targets.arr while $Index3 dec $Index3 = $Protect.Targets.local = $Protected.Targets.arr[$Index3] gosub Join.Missile.Arrays end
do if $is.missile.turret == null OR $Time < $Next.Extended.MD.Update endsub gosub Clean.Up.Global.MD.Array
$Missile.Ware = null gosub Get.Countermissile if not $Missile.Ware $Next.Extended.MD.Update = $Time + 59 endsub end
* M8 / M7M can project a "SAM umbrella" over their formation
* add all local formation members $Dummy1 = [THIS] -> get highest formation leader $Formation.arr = $Dummy1 -> get all formation followers if not is datatype[ $Formation.arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $Formation.arr = array alloc: size=0 else $Index3 = size of array $Formation.arr while $Index3 dec $Index3 = $Protect.Targets.local = $Formation.arr[$Index3] do if $Index3 == ( $Index3 / 22 ) * 22 @ = wait 100 ms if $Protect.Targets.local -> exists remove element from array $Formation.arr at index $Index3 else if [THIS] -> is docked remove element from array $Formation.arr at index $Index3 else if $Protect.Targets.local -> is docked remove element from array $Formation.arr at index $Index3 else if $Protect.Targets.local == [THIS] remove element from array $Formation.arr at index $Index3 else if find $Protect.Targets.local in array: $Protected.Targets.arr remove element from array $Formation.arr at index $Index3 else if not [THIS] -> has same environment as $Protect.Targets.local remove element from array $Formation.arr at index $Index3 else $Distance = get distance between [THIS] and $Protect.Targets.local do if $Distance > $My.Scanner.Range remove element from array $Formation.arr at index $Index3 end end end
* add all into $Formation array for a more efficient search $Index3 = size of array $Protected.Targets.arr while $Index3 dec $Index3 = $Protect.Targets.local = $Protected.Targets.arr[$Index3] append $Protect.Targets.local to array $Formation.arr end
* add all local wing members $Wing.arr = [THIS] -> get flight wing if $Wing.arr $Wing.arr = get flight wing ship array: wing=$Wing.arr if is datatype[ $Wing.arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $Index3 = size of array $Wing.arr while $Index3 dec $Index3 = $Protect.Targets.local = $Wing.arr[$Index3] do if $Index3 == ( $Index3 / 22 ) * 22 @ = wait 100 ms do if [THIS] -> is docked break skip if $Protect.Targets.local -> exists continue do if $Protect.Targets.local == [THIS] continue do if find $Protect.Targets.local in array: $Formation.arr continue skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $Protect.Targets.local continue $Distance = get distance between [THIS] and $Protect.Targets.local do if $Distance > $My.Scanner.Range continue append $Protect.Targets.local to array $Formation.arr end end end
* Now that I have all friendly ships: $Index3 = size of array $Formation.arr while $Index3 dec $Index3 = $Protect.Targets.local = $Formation.arr[$Index3] do if $Index3 == ( $Index3 / 22 ) * 22 @ = wait 100 ms gosub Join.Missile.Arrays end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Clean.Up.Global.MD.Array: * Clean up GDA - Missile boats only $Time = playing time if $Time > $Next.Global.MD.Cleanup $Dummy1 = random value from 90 to 120 - 1 $Next.Global.MD.Cleanup = $Time + $Dummy1 $Index3 = size of array $Global.Msl.Def.arr while $Index3 dec $Index3 = $Missile = $Global.Msl.Def.arr[$Index3] do if $Missile -> exists continue if not $Missile -> is in active sector remove element from array $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr at index $Index3 remove element from array $Global.Msl.Def.arr at index $Index3 continue end $Dummy1 = $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr[$Index3] do if $Time < $Dummy1 continue remove element from array $Global.Ctr.Msl.arr at index $Index3 remove element from array $Global.Msl.Def.arr at index $Index3 end end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Join.Missile.Arrays: * Uses Index1 + Index2 skip if $Protect.Targets.local -> exists endsub skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $Protect.Targets.local endsub $Missiles.Protect.arr = $Protect.Targets.local -> get array of missiles aiming to me $Index2 = size of array $Missiles.Protect.arr if $Index2 $Index1 = size of array $Missiles.Arr $Dummy1 = $Index1 + $Index2 dec $Index2 = resize array $Missiles.Arr to $Dummy1 copy array $Missiles.Protect.arr index 0 ... $Index2 into array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Select.Missile.Target: $fireonmissile = null $Threat.Max = -200000000 $Missiles.Visible = 0 skip if $is.missile.turret $Engagement.Distance = $Target.Min.Distance + 100 + ( $My.Laser.Range * 30 ) / 100
skip if is datatype[ $Missiles.Arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY endsub $Missile.Targets.arr = array alloc: size=0 $Missile.Targets.dmg.arr = array alloc: size=0 $Index1 = size of array $Missiles.Arr while $Index1 dec $Index1 = do if $Index1 == ( $Index1 / 16 ) * 16 @ = wait 50 ms skip if [THIS] -> is in active sector break do if [THIS] -> is docked break $Missile = $Missiles.Arr[$Index1] if not $Missile -> exists remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 continue else if not [THIS] -> has same environment as $Missile remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 continue end $Missile.Target = $Missile ->get missile aim in active sector $Missile.Ware = $Missile -> get ware type code of object *if $Missile -> is of class Astronaut *$Threat = 800000 + 800000 * $Attack.Enemies if $Missile.Ware == Boarding Pod $Threat = 800000 + 800000 * $Attack.Enemies else $Threat = get missile max damage of $Missile.Ware $Dummy1 = get missile flags of $Missile.Ware $Flag.Dumb = ( $Dummy1 & [Missile.Dumbfire] ) == [Missile.Dumbfire] $Flag.Swarm = ( $Dummy1 & [Missile.Swarm] ) == [Missile.Swarm] end
if $Missile.defence.level == 2 $Dummy1 = get index of $Missile.Target in array $Missile.Targets.arr offset=null + 1 if $Dummy1 == -1 append $Missile.Target to array $Missile.Targets.arr append $Threat to array $Missile.Targets.dmg.arr else $Incomming.Missile.dmg = $Missile.Targets.dmg.arr[$Dummy1] $Incomming.Missile.dmg = $Incomming.Missile.dmg + $Threat $Missile.Targets.dmg.arr[$Dummy1] = $Incomming.Missile.dmg end else if $Missile.defence.level == 1 if not $Missile.Ware == Boarding Pod $Dummy1 = $Missile.Target -> get current shield strength skip if $Threat >= $Dummy1 / 100 continue end end
if $is.missile.turret if $Threat < 1001 remove element from array $Missiles.Arr at index $Index1 * No decrease, not yet increased. *dec $Missiles.Visible = continue end $Distance = get distance between $Missile and [THIS] do if $Distance > $Countermissile.Range OR ( $Flag.Dumb AND $Distance > $Engage.Dumbfire.Range ) continue end do if $Flag.Dumb $Threat = $Threat / 3 if $Flag.Swarm $Threat = $Threat / 3 end
$Distance = get distance between $Missile and [THIS] if $is.missile.turret do if $Distance > $Countermissile.Range continue else skip if [THIS] -> is $Missile in firing range of turret $turretid continue * Eventually this turret wil find the min distance at which it looses targets $Target.Min.Distance = get minimum, $Target.Min.Distance, $Distance, null, null, null end
inc $Missiles.Visible =
if $is.missile.turret $Threat = $Threat - $Distance * 50 else if $Distance < $Engagement.Distance $Threat = $Threat - ( $Engagement.Distance - $Distance ) * 50 else $Threat = $Threat - ( $Distance - $Engagement.Distance ) * 50 end
* 6km = -300 000 dmg if $Threat > $Threat.Max $Threat.Max = $Threat $fireonmissile = $Missile end end
if $Missile.defence.level == 2 $Incomming.Missile.dmg = 0 $Dummy1 = size of array $Missile.Targets.arr while $Dummy1 dec $Dummy1 = do if $Dummy1 == ( $Dummy1 / 22 ) * 22 @ = wait 100 ms $Missile.Target = $Missile.Targets.arr[$Dummy1] $Dummy3 = $Missile.Targets.dmg.arr[$Dummy1] $Dummy2 = $Missile.Target -> get current shield strength if $Dummy3 >= $Dummy2 / 3 * find smallest barrage do if $Incomming.Missile.dmg == 0 OR $Incomming.Missile.dmg >= $Dummy3 $Incomming.Missile.dmg = $Dummy3 do if $Dummy2 > 0 AND $Dummy2 <= $Incomming.Missile.dmg $Incomming.Missile.dmg = $Dummy2 end end * No Barrage skip if $Incomming.Missile.dmg endsub * Barrage not in Range skip if $Threat.Max >= $Incomming.Missile.dmg / 100 endsub end
$Target = $fireonmissile do if $Weapon.Changing $firestate[$turretid] = $Target endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Find.Ship.Class: $Find.Ship.arr = find ship: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=$Class.Wanted race=null flags=$Find.Flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=$My.Scanner.Range maxnum=15 refpos=null $Distance.Min = 200000000 skip if is datatype[ $Find.Ship.arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY endsub $Index1 = size of array $Find.Ship.arr while $Index1 dec $Index1 = $Dummy1 = $Find.Ship.arr[$Index1] if $Class.Unwanted do if $Dummy1 -> is of class $Class.Unwanted continue end if $is.missile.turret $Dummy2 = $Dummy1 -> find nearest missile aiming to me do if $Dummy2 -> exists continue else skip if [THIS] -> is $Dummy1 in firing range of turret $turretid continue end $Dummy2 = get distance between [THIS] and $Dummy1 if $Dummy2 < $Distance.Min $Distance.Min = $Dummy2 $Target = $Dummy1 end end resize array $Find.Ship.arr to 0 endsub return null

comment.var: Multi-Purpose X3 Turret Script - by Gazz
Formerly known as Missile Defense Mk2.
Arguments:
turret.id : not required but demanded by engine by ancient custom.
Script: The turret script profile to load. (INT 10-19)
Missile turret
Laser turret

line.text: get max. number of lasers in turret

comment.var: Rate of fire refinement has to be put on hold in a low energy condition.
Missile turrets always fire a few extra missiles. More if the target has turrets
- - - Main loop - - -
Happens when scripts start a turret script directly

line.text: get max laser strength in turret

comment.var: Target was destroyed or left range, better to swap back to longer range guns.
Still firing - just switching to another target
A long wait is not necessary because the laser refire rate is added.
Don't doze off while the ship is still fighting :
For firing at single missiles.
Look for a new target after x seconds
1=cap ships, 2=all ships
firestate will be updated while the script runs

line.text: select and switch lasers for target

line.comment: *[THIS] ->select and switch lasers for target $victim in turret $turretid: scan for friends $Weapon.Changing.AREA

comment.var: dynamically adjust rate of fire

line.text: get default launch time difference for missile type:

comment.var: Otherwise a laser out of ammo or energy would PERMANENTLY lower ROF.
track and fire - LASERS
if a lesser priority target is tracked, occasionally check for primary objective

line.text: find nearest missile aiming to me

comment.var: track SHIP
track MISSILE
Engage multiple missiles before the bullets hit
still tracking - only ever happens with heavy lasers
= end while - tracking
Fire on a ship / station

line.text: get default launch time difference for missile type:

comment.var: Fire on a ship / station

line.text: get fire missile time difference in seconds
set fire missile time difference to
set fire missile time difference to

comment.var: Find the best countermissile we have.
Do not make the script call if we can reuse the previous one.

line.text: get compatible missile array from cargobay

comment.var: Unless on a manual loadout by the player, this gets me a laser the first time.
Attack cockpit target - playership only
Attack cockpit target - all ships
Attack what my ship is attacking
Attack any enemies
Include stations

line.text: find enemy in firing range of turret

comment.var: Attack any enemies - conditional on ship orders
Include stations

line.text: find enemy in firing range of turret

comment.var: Attack capital ships - big
Attack capital ships - huge
Attack fighters
Protect ship
There can be multiple protected objects.
Missile Defense Any
Attack capital ships - only big
Missile Defense High Yield
Missile Defense Barrages
Don't shoot civilians
Missile turrets skip targets that already have missiles incoming

line.text: find nearest missile aiming to me
find nearest missile aiming to me

comment.var: Do not shoot at your own missiles - ever
This ship is protecting... something... in active.sector
Illegal type
Type is a pos array or sector
In either case I will protect the 2 closest non-hostile stations.

line.text: select and switch lasers for target
get max laser strength in turret

line.comment: *$Dummy1 = sprintf: fmt='%s %s Firing delay: %s', $Dummy1, [THIS], $Firing.Delay, null, null

comment.var: There is one other guaranteed interrupt already.
Any more totally kill fast lasers like PBE or PRG.

line.text: get array of missiles aiming to me

comment.var: Engage missiles incoming to targets that I am *ordered* to protect.
M8 / M7M can project a "SAM umbrella" over their formation
add all local formation members
add all into $Formation array for a more efficient search
add all local wing members

line.text: get flight wing ship array: wing=

comment.var: Now that I have all friendly ships:
Clean up GDA - Missile boats only
Uses Index1 + Index2

line.text: get array of missiles aiming to me
get missile aim in active sector
get ware type code of object

comment.var: No decrease, not yet increased.
Eventually this turret wil find the min distance at which it looses targets
find smallest barrage
No Barrage

sval.val: Turret Missile Defense Mk3 - main script
turret id
Multi-Purpose X3 Turret Script - by Gazz
Formerly known as Missile Defense Mk2.
turret.id : not required but demanded by engine by ancient custom.
Script: The turret script profile to load. (INT 10-19)
Missile turret
Laser turret
Rate of fire refinement has to be put on hold in a low energy condition.
Missile turrets always fire a few extra missiles. More if the target has turrets
- - - Main loop - - -
Happens when scripts start a turret script directly
Target was destroyed or left range, better to swap back to longer range guns.
Still firing - just switching to another target
A long wait is not necessary because the laser refire rate is added.
Don't doze off while the ship is still fighting :
For firing at single missiles.
Look for a new target after x seconds
1=cap ships, 2=all ships
firestate will be updated while the script runs
dynamically adjust rate of fire
Otherwise a laser out of ammo or energy would PERMANENTLY lower ROF.
track and fire - LASERS
if a lesser priority target is tracked, occasionally check for primary objective
track SHIP
track MISSILE
Engage multiple missiles before the bullets hit
still tracking - only ever happens with heavy lasers
= end while - tracking
Fire on a ship / station
Fire on a ship / station
Find the best countermissile we have.
Do not make the script call if we can reuse the previous one.
Unless on a manual loadout by the player, this gets me a laser the first time.
Attack cockpit target - playership only
Attack cockpit target - all ships

Include stations

Missile Defense Barrages
Don't shoot civilians

Do not shoot at your own missiles - ever
This ship is protecting... something... in active.sector
Illegal type
Type is a pos array or sector
In either case I will protect the 2 closest non-hostile stations.
%s %s Firing delay: %s
There is one other guaranteed interrupt already.
Any more totally kill fast lasers like PBE or PRG.
Engage missiles incoming to targets that I am *ordered* to protect.
M8 / M7M can project a "SAM umbrella" over their formation
add all local formation members
add all into $Formation array for a more efficient search
add all local wing members
Now that I have all friendly ships:
Clean up GDA - Missile boats only
Uses Index1 + Index2
